tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "D2D3BD8E4E0EC2FFBA95F3A79EBBA63D", "As Mayor, you have the authority to declare War against other Nodes in the world.")

NSLOCTEXT("[FEA8EFE747B6BFEF48AD2AB3CBEF2B13]", "877506B04278C73CA97930A77138E38E", "Before you can declare a Node War, you must first acquire a War Declaration Scroll. War Declaration Scrolls may be acquired by fulfilling the War Preparations Mayoral Commission.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "3E7BBC5740E36A622DD48E9D8D757546", "Once your node has a War Declaration Scroll, you can use it by going to the Relationships tab of the Citizenship Menu. Use the Declare War option after selecting target Node.")
